### West Block South Entrance Security Gates Invitation to Tender

#### Notice Information

*   **Ref #:** WS4670240881-Doc4670270522
*   **Posting Date:** July 5, 2024
*   **Closing Date and Time:** July 26, 2024, 14:00 Eastern Time
*   **Contract Start Date:** July 29, 2024
*   **Contract End Date:** September 16, 2024

The Department of Public Works and Government Services is issuing an Invitation to Tender (ITT) for the installation of two new security gates at the West Block South Entrance, a project associated with the House of Commons. This ITT is an update to the original Invitation to Tender notice and supersedes it in its entirety. All previous documents have been voided.

Only Holders of Supply Arrangement (SA) EP938-232165 may participate in this request for proposal, unless they are interested in selecting General Contractor SA holders. Other bidders may not submit a proposal for this requirement unless they qualify as a supplier on the SA before being provided the opportunity to bid. Interested companies can find the full solicitation documents on Canada Buys using this link: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities/tender-notice/ws4128712580-doc4128852077

#### Project Description

This ITT seeks contractors capable of removing the existing swing door and security gate, and installing the two new security gates. The new security gates must be operational by September 16, 2024.

Optional services include addressing temperature concerns in the lobby and will be considered separately.
